title: Protest underway demanding LP gas in Pelawatte
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A group of protestors is currently engaged in a protest while blocking the 174 route, Battaramulla – Kottawa road at the Pelawatta junction demanding LP Gas.
Our correspondents stated that the group has been protesting at the junction since this morning.
Peaceful expression of dissent is not an emergency: UN Resident Coordinator
